title: TROLLS, REPORT SYSTEM AND RANKED
body:
i had this game where nunu and ashe premades, banned our mains on purpose when they saw we picked them, then proceeded to win their lane, and after they took first tower, started going up to champions and standing there feeding non stop over and over while ashe farmed jungle and nvr went into lane
we called for their report cuz of them trolling and they began to call us r%%%%%ed and stupid cuz they didnt see us hover over our champions even tho we had, and they banned both ww and gnar and then acted liek they wasnt premade and they banned the champs cuz they hated them, mind u nunu is support and ashe is bot why would they need to ban gnar and ww they said they always ban them but i checked their matches and they only ban other peoples mains, and troll
https://i.imgur.com/xkfnlFp.png
https://i.imgur.com/mAeSz3w.png
nunu's match history all they do is play ranked, once they take first tower they proceede to feed non stop every single game they have managed to only win a single ranked game 

i reported them and so did my premade and about 50 seconds later we both got this 
https://i.imgur.com/KvFNbR4.png
https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/400410123979325451/665770428458860590/unknown.png
let me tell u ive nvr been so happy in my life to see someone finally get banned who deserves it
ive now lost 3 ranked games due to trolls, i have yet to lose a game where someone doesnt int or troll i hate that i got placed in iron just cuz i dont play hardly any ranked games.  its full of trolls and complete assholes.

after the report they played a match where they finally played like normal and didnt feed 
https://i.imgur.com/3n5sNRL.png
compare the scores, and its not like they was losing lane or anything cuz they was getting kills and all then switched to afk feeding

i hope they get perma banned cuz they been doing this for so long now, they stack up kills and damage, so they wont seem like they feeding then suddenly once they have enough they just feed non stop like crazy so the system wont see them as feeding but problem with that, if u can 1v1 jinx when u both same lvl and kill her u can 1v1 her when u are 13/0 and she is 0/10 the system is going to know u was just standing around not even trying, especially if u die over and over to someone who has a single iteam and u are full build{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 

idk wat kind of punishment they got, definitely not a ban since they are still playing but it was something cuz now they are playing normally, smh cant belive it took so long for something to be done

replies.body:
I speak against many and the worst I have been called was... actually, haven't really been called anything by anyone here. Does "wrong" count? I wouldn't refute that I had been wrong. Not counting raging *and* ignorant people. Their opinions are irrelevant. I'll let em know, since I'm not trying to be a specialist whom become restricted in how crass they can be against dirtbags.

At the same time, it also allows me to show sympathy for those who are guilty of breaking rules but not a considerate sense of morality.

I've gone and called a scumbag out and another individual a darn white knight, both once, but never got called anything by anyone who advocates or understand the rules. If I remember correctly.

Hope you understand, this isn't a lie or propaganda. *It's just you.*

Keep in mind, you only get one under specific conditions. Even if you dont, it does not mean no action was taken.
so so tasty, its the most satisfying feeling ever, make some asmr but it only consist of feeders and afk ppl getting reported and having a instant feedback pop up

There's something about reading this I found a bit disturbing. I mean a lot of things makes me happy but I cannot imagine something like this would make me the most happy I have ever been in my life. Does League have us so addicted that such inconsequential things actually make us this happy? This makes me wonder if we are nothing more than junkies.
